body:not([data-lang=en]) .homepage-hero .takeover-hero-stats {
  display: none;
}

@media screen and (min-width: 48em) {
  body.hero-animation:not(.no-animate) .fade.fade-in {
    opacity: 0;
  }
  body.hero-animation:not(.no-animate) .fade.fade-in.fade-in-opacity-low {
    opacity: 0.25;
  }
  body.hero-animation:not(.no-animate) .fade.fade-out {
    opacity: 1;
  }
  body.hero-animation:not(.no-animate) .fade.fade-in.animate {
    opacity: 1;
  }
  body.hero-animation:not(.no-animate) .fade.fade-out.animate {
    opacity: 0;
  }
  body.hero-animation:not(.no-animate) .fade.animate {
    -webkit-transition: opacity 1s ease;
    transition: opacity 1s ease;
  }
  body.hero-animation:not(.no-animate) .fade.fade-delay-2.animate {
    transition-delay: 0.5s;
  }
  body.hero-animation:not(.no-animate) .fade.fade-delay-3.animate {
    transition-delay: 1s;
  }
  body.hero-animation:not(.no-animate) .fade.fade-delay-4.animate {
    transition-delay: 1.5s;
  }
  body.hero-animation:not(.no-animate) .fade.fade-delay-5.animate {
    transition-delay: 2s;
  }
  body.hero-animation:not(.no-animate) .fade.fade-delay-6.animate {
    transition-delay: 2.5s;
  }
  body.hero-animation:not(.no-animate) .zoom {
    transform: scale(0.1);
  }
  body.hero-animation:not(.no-animate) .zoom.animate {
    transform: scale(1);
    -webkit-transition: transform 1.5s ease, opacity 1.5s ease;
    transition: transform 1.5s ease, opacity 1.5s ease;
  }
  body.hero-animation:not(.no-animate) .slide.slide-right {
    transform: translateX(-40%);
  }
  body.hero-animation:not(.no-animate) .slide.slide-left {
    transform: translateX(40%);
  }
  body.hero-animation:not(.no-animate) .slide.animate {
    transform: translateX(0);
    -webkit-transition: transform 1.2s ease, opacity 1s ease;
    transition: transform 1.2s ease, opacity 1s ease;
  }
}
body.hero-animation:not(.no-animate) .takeover-hero-product.takeover-hero-product-powerscale {
  transform-origin: 50% 30%;
}

@media screen and (min-width: 48em) {
  body.takeover-color:not(.no-takeover) .takeover-hero-bg-gradient {
    opacity: 0;
  }
  body.takeover:not(.no-takeover):not(.no-animate).takeover-color.takeover-color-fade {
    transition: background-color 1.5s;
  }
  body.takeover:not(.no-takeover):not(.no-animate).takeover-color .takeover-hero-bg-gradient {
    opacity: 0;
    transition: opacity 1.5s ease;
  }
  body.takeover:not(.no-takeover):not(.no-animate).takeover-color .takeover-hero-bg {
    transition-duration: 1.5s;
  }
  body.takeover:not(.no-takeover):not(.no-animate).takeover-color.takeover-color-white:not(.takeover-color-fade-active) {
    background-color: #FFFFFF;
  }
  body.takeover:not(.no-takeover):not(.no-animate).takeover-color.takeover-color-white:not(.takeover-color-fade-active) .takeover-hero-bg-gradient {
    opacity: 1;
  }
  body.takeover:not(.no-takeover):not(.no-animate).takeover-color.takeover-color-white .takeover-hero-bg-gradient:after {
    background-image: linear-gradient(rgba(255, 255, 255, 0), #FFFFFF 70%);
  }
  body.takeover:not(.no-takeover):not(.no-animate).takeover-color.takeover-color-white .takeover-hero-presents &gt; div {
    color: #0076CE;
  }
  body.takeover:not(.no-takeover):not(.no-animate).takeover-color.takeover-color-almost-white:not(.takeover-color-fade-active) {
    background-color: #EEEEEE;
  }
  body.takeover:not(.no-takeover):not(.no-animate).takeover-color.takeover-color-almost-white:not(.takeover-color-fade-active) .takeover-hero-bg-gradient {
    opacity: 1;
  }
  body.takeover:not(.no-takeover):not(.no-animate).takeover-color.takeover-color-almost-white .takeover-hero-bg-gradient:after {
    background-image: linear-gradient(rgba(238, 238, 238, 0), #EEEEEE 70%);
  }
  body.takeover:not(.no-takeover):not(.no-animate).takeover-color.takeover-color-almost-white .takeover-hero-presents &gt; div {
    color: #0076CE;
  }
  body.takeover:not(.no-takeover):not(.no-animate).takeover-color.takeover-color-gray:not(.takeover-color-fade-active) {
    background-color: #808080;
  }
  body.takeover:not(.no-takeover):not(.no-animate).takeover-color.takeover-color-gray:not(.takeover-color-fade-active) .takeover-hero-bg-gradient {
    opacity: 1;
  }
  body.takeover:not(.no-takeover):not(.no-animate).takeover-color.takeover-color-gray .takeover-hero-bg-gradient:after {
    background-image: linear-gradient(rgba(128, 128, 128, 0), #808080 70%);
  }
  body.takeover:not(.no-takeover):not(.no-animate).takeover-color.takeover-color-gray .takeover-hero-presents &gt; div {
    color: #FFFFFF;
  }
  body.takeover:not(.no-takeover):not(.no-animate).takeover-color.takeover-color-carbon:not(.takeover-color-fade-active) {
    background-color: #444444;
  }
  body.takeover:not(.no-takeover):not(.no-animate).takeover-color.takeover-color-carbon:not(.takeover-color-fade-active) .takeover-hero-bg-gradient {
    opacity: 1;
  }
  body.takeover:not(.no-takeover):not(.no-animate).takeover-color.takeover-color-carbon .takeover-hero-bg-gradient:after {
    background-image: linear-gradient(rgba(68, 68, 68, 0), #444444 70%);
  }
  body.takeover:not(.no-takeover):not(.no-animate).takeover-color.takeover-color-carbon .takeover-hero-presents &gt; div {
    color: #FFFFFF;
  }
  body.takeover:not(.no-takeover):not(.no-animate).takeover-color.takeover-color-almost-black:not(.takeover-color-fade-active) {
    background-color: #1A1A1A;
  }
  body.takeover:not(.no-takeover):not(.no-animate).takeover-color.takeover-color-almost-black:not(.takeover-color-fade-active) .takeover-hero-bg-gradient {
    opacity: 1;
  }
  body.takeover:not(.no-takeover):not(.no-animate).takeover-color.takeover-color-almost-black .takeover-hero-bg-gradient:after {
    background-image: linear-gradient(rgba(26, 26, 26, 0), #1A1A1A 70%);
  }
  body.takeover:not(.no-takeover):not(.no-animate).takeover-color.takeover-color-almost-black .takeover-hero-presents &gt; div {
    color: #FFFFFF;
  }
  body.takeover:not(.no-takeover):not(.no-animate).takeover-color.takeover-color-black:not(.takeover-color-fade-active) {
    background-color: #000000;
  }
  body.takeover:not(.no-takeover):not(.no-animate).takeover-color.takeover-color-black:not(.takeover-color-fade-active) .takeover-hero-bg-gradient {
    opacity: 1;
  }
  body.takeover:not(.no-takeover):not(.no-animate).takeover-color.takeover-color-black .takeover-hero-bg-gradient:after {
    background-image: linear-gradient(rgba(0, 0, 0, 0), #000000 70%);
  }
  body.takeover:not(.no-takeover):not(.no-animate).takeover-color.takeover-color-black .takeover-hero-presents &gt; div {
    color: #FFFFFF;
  }
  body.takeover:not(.no-takeover):not(.no-animate).takeover-color.takeover-color-dell-blue:not(.takeover-color-fade-active) {
    background-color: #0076CE;
  }
  body.takeover:not(.no-takeover):not(.no-animate).takeover-color.takeover-color-dell-blue:not(.takeover-color-fade-active) .takeover-hero-bg-gradient {
    opacity: 1;
  }
  body.takeover:not(.no-takeover):not(.no-animate).takeover-color.takeover-color-dell-blue .takeover-hero-bg-gradient:after {
    background-image: linear-gradient(rgba(0, 118, 206, 0), #0076CE 70%);
  }
  body.takeover:not(.no-takeover):not(.no-animate).takeover-color.takeover-color-dell-blue .takeover-hero-presents &gt; div {
    color: #FFFFFF;
  }
  body.takeover:not(.no-takeover):not(.no-animate).takeover-color.takeover-color-midnight:not(.takeover-color-fade-active) {
    background-color: #00447C;
  }
  body.takeover:not(.no-takeover):not(.no-animate).takeover-color.takeover-color-midnight:not(.takeover-color-fade-active) .takeover-hero-bg-gradient {
    opacity: 1;
  }
  body.takeover:not(.no-takeover):not(.no-animate).takeover-color.takeover-color-midnight .takeover-hero-bg-gradient:after {
    background-image: linear-gradient(rgba(0, 68, 124, 0), #00447C 70%);
  }
  body.takeover:not(.no-takeover):not(.no-animate).takeover-color.takeover-color-midnight .takeover-hero-presents &gt; div {
    color: #FFFFFF;
  }
}
body.takeover.takeover-color.takeover-color-white .takeover-hero-bg-gradient:after {
  background-image: linear-gradient(rgba(255, 255, 255, 0), #FFFFFF 70%);
}
body.takeover.takeover-color.takeover-color-almost-white .takeover-hero-bg-gradient:after {
  background-image: linear-gradient(rgba(238, 238, 238, 0), #EEEEEE 70%);
}
body.takeover.takeover-color.takeover-color-gray .takeover-hero-bg-gradient:after {
  background-image: linear-gradient(rgba(128, 128, 128, 0), #808080 70%);
}
body.takeover.takeover-color.takeover-color-carbon .takeover-hero-bg-gradient:after {
  background-image: linear-gradient(rgba(68, 68, 68, 0), #444444 70%);
}
body.takeover.takeover-color.takeover-color-almost-black .takeover-hero-bg-gradient:after {
  background-image: linear-gradient(rgba(26, 26, 26, 0), #1A1A1A 70%);
}
body.takeover.takeover-color.takeover-color-black .takeover-hero-bg-gradient:after {
  background-image: linear-gradient(rgba(0, 0, 0, 0), #000000 70%);
}
body.takeover.takeover-color.takeover-color-dell-blue .takeover-hero-bg-gradient:after {
  background-image: linear-gradient(rgba(0, 118, 206, 0), #0076CE 70%);
}
body.takeover.takeover-color.takeover-color-midnight .takeover-hero-bg-gradient:after {
  background-image: linear-gradient(rgba(0, 68, 124, 0), #00447C 70%);
}

.homepage-hero {
  margin-top: -110px;
}

  padding-top: 110px;
}

  display: flex;
  padding-top: 40px;
  padding-bottom: 40px;
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 1420px;
  justify-content: center;
}

  .homepage-hero .takeover-hero.takeover-hero-center .takeover-hero-content {
    padding-left: 20px;
    padding-right: 20px;
  }
}

    padding-left: 50px;
    padding-right: 50px;

}

    padding-left: 0;
    padding-right: 0;
  }
}

    padding-bottom: 75px;

    margin-left: 0;
  }
}

@media screen and (min-width: 48em) {
  .homepage-hero .mobile-only {
    display: none;
  }
}
.homepage-hero .takeover-hero {
  display: flex;
  position: relative;
  flex-flow: column;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  overflow: hidden;
  /* homepage hero stats */
}
.homepage-hero .takeover-hero .takeover-hero-presents {
  display: flex;
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  height: 100%;
  width: 100%;
  flex-flow: column;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  opacity: 0;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
}
.homepage-hero .takeover-hero .takeover-hero-presents &gt; div {
  color: #0076CE;
  font-size: 15px;
  margin-top: 70px;
  letter-spacing: 1.5px;
}
.homepage-hero .takeover-hero .takeover-hero-bg {
  display: flex;
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  overflow: hidden;
  z-index: -1;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-size: cover;
  background-position: center center;
  transform: translateX(-50%) translateY(-50%);
  max-width: 2000px;
}
.homepage-hero .takeover-hero .takeover-hero-bg.video-width-specific video {
  width: 100%;
  height: auto;
}
.homepage-hero .takeover-hero .takeover-hero-bg.video-align-top {
  background-position: center top;
}
.homepage-hero .takeover-hero .takeover-hero-bg.video-align-top video {
  top: 0;
  transform: translateX(-50%);
}
.homepage-hero .takeover-hero .takeover-hero-bg.video-align-bottom video {
  top: unset;
  bottom: 0;
  transform: translateX(-50%);
}
.homepage-hero .takeover-hero .takeover-hero-bg.video-align-left {
  background-position: left center;
}
.homepage-hero .takeover-hero .takeover-hero-bg.video-align-left video {
  left: 0;
  transform: translateX(0) translateY(-50%);
}
.homepage-hero .takeover-hero .takeover-hero-bg.video-align-left.video-align-top {
  background-position: left top;
}
.homepage-hero .takeover-hero .takeover-hero-bg.video-align-left.video-align-top video {
  top: 0;
  transform: translateX(0) translateY(0);
}
.homepage-hero .takeover-hero .takeover-hero-bg.video-align-left.video-align-bottom {
  background-position: left bottom;
}
.homepage-hero .takeover-hero .takeover-hero-bg.video-align-left.video-align-bottom video {
  top: unset;
  bottom: 0;
  transform: translateX(0) translateY(0);
}
.homepage-hero .takeover-hero .takeover-hero-bg.video-align-right {
  background-position: right center;
}
.homepage-hero .takeover-hero .takeover-hero-bg.video-align-right video {
  right: 0;
  left: unset;
  transform: translateX(0) translateY(-50%);
}
.homepage-hero .takeover-hero .takeover-hero-bg.video-align-right.video-align-top {
  background-position: right top;
}
.homepage-hero .takeover-hero .takeover-hero-bg.video-align-right.video-align-top video {
  top: 0;
  transform: translateX(0) translateY(0);
}
.homepage-hero .takeover-hero .takeover-hero-bg.video-align-right.video-align-bottom {
  background-position: right bottom;
}
.homepage-hero .takeover-hero .takeover-hero-bg.video-align-right.video-align-bottom video {
  right: 0;
  left: unset;
  transform: translateX(0) translateY(0);
}
.homepage-hero .takeover-hero .takeover-hero-bg video {
  position: absolute;
  min-height: 100%;
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
  width: auto;
  height: 100%;
  transform: translateX(-50%) translateY(-50%);
}
@media all and (-ms-high-contrast: none), (-ms-high-contrast: active) {
  .homepage-hero .takeover-hero .takeover-hero-bg video {
    display: none;
  }
}
.homepage-hero .takeover-hero .takeover-hero-bg-gradient {
  position: absolute;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
}
.homepage-hero .takeover-hero .takeover-hero-bg-gradient:after {
  content: "";
  display: block;
  position: absolute;
  width: 100%;
  height: 50%;
  bottom: -1px;
  background-image: linear-gradient(rgba(255, 255, 255, 0), white 70%);
}

  /*font-weight: 700!important*/

  }
